[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1002003 - Statement - État du résultat global, composantes des autres éléments du résultat global présentées nettes d’impôt (Statement) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1005006 - Statement - État des flux de trésorerie, méthode indirecte (Statement) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations, ifrs-full:OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesOnRemeasurementsOfDefinedBenefitPlans, ifrs-full:IncomeTaxRelatingToComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss, ifrs-full:IncomeTaxRelatingToComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1004005 - Statement - État des variations des capitaux propres (Statement) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLoss, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughChangeInEquityOfSubsidiaries, ifrs-full:CancellationOfTreasuryShares, ifrs-full:OtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax, ifrs-full:IssueOfEquity, itp:EcartsDeConversion, ifrs-full:DividendsPaid, ifrs-full:Equity, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersAndOtherChangesEquity, ifrs-full:OtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9627] It is expected that ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests with a value of -314,000 reported in the network role http://www.interparfums.fr/role/tatdesfluxdetrsoreriemthodeindirecteStatement, http://www.interparfums.fr/role/tatdursultatglobalcomposantesdesautreslmentsdursultatglobalprsentesnettesdimptStatement, http://www.interparfums.fr/role/tatdursultatglobalrsultatnetchargesparfonctionStatement should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ProfitLoss with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember and a reported value of 314,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.interparfums.fr/role/tatdesvariationsdescapitauxpropresStatement. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests fact are:
Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests : -3 Decimals of ProfitLoss : -3 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/969500SARWF33OPQED48/2021-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/itp-2021-12-31AR.zip/itp-2021-12-31AR/reports/itp-2021-12-31AR.xhtml 1446
